* Dinobot didn't bother to watch Sineses leave the scene as the pain in his 
stomach increased, it was now becoming overwhelming!
He snarled as he looked away and towards the Ark, he knew that that kick 
from Scourge had done something to him...it had only taken some time to 
surface.
He breather hard...*

" Computer, relay diagnostic."

* With difficulty his system soon came up with the exact reason why he was 
in pain...*

Internal Comp: " Subject has obtained 72% damage to super structure.
Acquired damage. External: 4 inch slash along jaw line, weakened armor in 
sections A-6 and 3-12 of torso. Internal: punctured respitory system, 
lacerated vertebral column in vertebra 3-H and 6-p12, punctured and 
compacted mech-fluid pump 12-331."

* Dinobot cringed at the damage in which his systems had detected, none of 
the external damage was serious but all of the internal was! A punctured 
lung, two sections of his spine severed, and a bursted and flattened 
mech-fluid pump, this must had not been his day! No wonder he had been 
feeling pains in his stomach, there was at lease 2 leaters of loose 
mech-fluid sloshing around his stomach and a threat that it could enter his 
damaged lung...basically drowning him.
Dinobot slowly bent down to retrieve his weapon when suddenly he felt 
something like a whirlpool in his stomach, soon that feeling developed into 
a pain that caused him to snarl and begin to breath quickly.
He stayed in that squatting position as he bowed his head, the rifle only a 
few inches away.
Suddenly his stomach lurched and he felt the mech-fluid in his stomach 
quickly make it's way up his throat, he put his hand over his mouth but even 
that didn't prevent the fluid from escaping his body.
Dinobot felt the fluid fill his mouth then begin to escape it, he opened it 
and let the mech-fluid flow from his lips and around his clawed figures.
He didn't feel sick but the sound of his own mech-fluid splattering against 
his legs and ground wasn't what he would call a picnic, he took his fluid 
dripping hand away from his mouth and took in a slow breath.
Dinobot knew that he was in no fighting condition but if battle called again 
he would answer it...without fear.
He slowly looked up as he felt a less painful feeling in his stomach as well 
as the one caused by his injuries, hunger pains.
Dinobot spat off to the side but a new flow of fluid soon replaced the last, 
he closed his optics and took a slow but deep breath. He had to stand the 
pain...just a little bit longer!
As he squatted by his weapon the same urging feeling came over him as it did 
just before the battle, when no bot knew that they were going to be 
attacked. That feeling had never let him down, why would it do so now?
With the extent of his damage Dinobot no longer wished to battle for stupid 
things such as enemies who only wanted to annoy him, but if he was needed he 
would fight...even with the damage.
But the feeling in which he had now he knew for a fact that he would have to 
battle again before he could finally rest and repair, she sighed and spat 
again.
Dinobot had hear Tavatron's question and it sounded like she was concerned 
about him, she must have known that he was in dear pain. But now it would be 
hard to hide it, a puddle now formed around him of his own fluid.
He looked away and growled but even that hurt and sounder a little wet, he 
was damaged and there was no way that he could hide it now.
But he didn't want to worry her any longer...*

" I am...alright."

* Another flow of mech-fluid came from his mouth but he turned away, his 
tail not even moving but laying in a curved line behind him.
Dinobot snarled, damn that Predacon...Scourge!*
